home.title: Manus AI - Making AI Your Assistant
home.description: Manus AI is a leading general-purpose AI Agent that helps you complete various complex tasks.

Cases.title: Manus AI's Extraordinary Capabilities
Cases.description: Manus AI excels at handling various complex tasks, providing comprehensive intelligent assistance
Cases.viewAll: View More Manus AI Use Cases

data-analysis.title: Data Analysis & Visualization
data-analysis.description: Upload data, and Manus AI automatically analyzes and generates rich, intuitive data visualizations and reports

code-development.title: Code Development & Debugging
code-development.description: Present your requirements, and Manus AI automatically writes, tests, and deploys code to create complete applications

content-creation.title: Content Creation & Design
content-creation.description: Manus AI generates beautiful slides, reports, charts, and various design materials to improve work efficiency

research.title: In-depth Research & Information Organization
research.description: Manus AI automatically collects and organizes information from multiple sources, generating comprehensive research reports

travel-planning.title: Travel Planning & Arrangements
travel-planning.description: Based on budget and preferences, Manus AI automatically generates complete travel plans, including attractions, transportation, and accommodations

document-processing.title: Document Batch Processing
document-processing.description: Manus AI batch analyzes contracts, financial statements, user feedback, and other documents to extract key information

Footer.description: Manus AI is a general-purpose AI Agent that understands your needs and automatically completes various complex tasks to improve work efficiency.

meta.title: Manus AI - The World's First General-Purpose AI Assistant Launching in 2025
meta.description: Manus AI is the world's first general-purpose AI agent launched by a company established in 2025, capable of turning thoughts into actions, achieving SOTA performance in GAIA benchmarks. Manus AI excels at automatically completing complex tasks such as travel planning, stock analysis, and content creation.
meta.keywords: Manus AI, Manus AI Assistant, General-Purpose AI, 2025 AI, GAIA Benchmark, SOTA Performance, Manus AI Agent, B2B AI Solutions, Stock Analysis AI, Travel Planning AI, Intelligent Assistant, Task Automation, AI Agent

og.title: Manus AI - The World's First General-Purpose AI Assistant Launching in 2025
og.description: Manus AI derives from the Latin word for 'hand,' symbolizing the ability to execute tasks, achieving SOTA performance across all GAIA benchmark difficulty levels, far surpassing GPT-4

twitter.title: Manus AI - The World's First General-Purpose AI Assistant Launching in 2025
twitter.description: Manus AI is a powerful general-purpose AI agent that turns users' ideas into actions, handling various tasks including B2B supplier sourcing and financial report analysis

hero.title: The AI Assistant That Turns Thoughts Into Actions
hero.description: Manus AI is a world-leading general-purpose AI agent designed to help users efficiently complete various complex tasks. The name Manus comes from the Latin word for 'hand,' symbolizing its ability to execute tasks. It has achieved state-of-the-art (SOTA) performance across all three difficulty levels in the GAIA benchmark, far surpassing other AI assistants.

tips.title: Manus AI Usage Tips - AI Leader Founded in 2025

expression.title: Manus AI Request Expression Techniques
expression.description: The clearer and more specific your description of what Manus AI should deliver, the more precisely Manus AI will execute. Clearly state expectations, format requirements, and quality standards.

breakdown.title: Manus AI Task Breakdown Method
breakdown.description: For complex tasks, use a progressive approach: have Manus AI complete one part first, then provide further requirements based on intermediate results.

knowledge.title: Manus AI Knowledge System
knowledge.description: Add specific requirements and preferences to Manus AI, or when Manus AI completes an operation satisfactorily, tell it to 'remember this approach for next time.'

correction.title: Manus AI Timely Correction
correction.description: When you notice Manus AI's execution deviating from expectations, intervene immediately with guidance rather than waiting until the task is complete. Manus AI will quickly adjust its strategy.

overview.title: Why Choose Manus AI
overview.description1: Founded in 2025, Manus AI is a powerful general-purpose AI agent designed to turn users' ideas into actions. In the GAIA benchmark tests, Manus AI has achieved state-of-the-art (SOTA) performance across all three difficulty levels, far surpassing other AI assistants currently on the market.
overview.description2: Manus AI doesn't just provide advice but delivers complete task results directly. Humans score 92% on GAIA tests, while GPT-4 with plugins only scores 15%. Manus AI's performance significantly exceeds current advanced models.

supports.environments: Manus AI Adapts to Various Environments

architecture.title: How Manus AI Works
architecture.description: Manus AI employs an advanced Agent architecture that understands requirements, plans steps, calls tools, and executes tasks.
architecture.diagram:
flowchart TB
    Input[User Requirements]-->|Understand Intent|Planning[Task Planning]
    Planning-->|Break Down Steps|Execution[Execute Tasks]
    Execution-->|Call Tools|Tools[Tool Integration]
    Tools-->|Process Results|Output[Complete Tasks]
    subgraph Core Capabilities
        Understanding[Understanding Ability]
        Reasoning[Reasoning Ability]
        ToolUsage[Tool Usage]
    end

server.title: How Manus AI Differs from Traditional Chatbots
server.description: Manus AI has significant advantages compared to traditional chatbots like ChatGPT and Claude:

items.example: Browser, Code Editor, Data Analysis Tools, etc.

features.title: Manus AI's Tool Calling Capability
features.description: Traditional chatbots can only provide text answers or suggestions, while Manus AI systematically plans and executes tasks, actively calling various tools to truly help you complete complex tasks end-to-end.
items: Manus AI actively calls browsers, code editors, data analysis tools, etc.
Manus AI doesn't just tell you 'what you should do' but directly does it for you
Manus AI delivers complete results rather than just providing guidance

features.title: Manus AI's Independent Operation Capability
features.description: Manus AI has its own computing environment and can work independently without requiring your continuous supervision.
items: While you handle other matters, Manus AI autonomously completes tasks in the background
Manus AI truly frees your time and attention
Manus AI works in a 'delegate-deliver' mode

features.title: Manus AI's New Human-Machine Interaction Paradigm
features.description: Collaborating with Manus AI is more like working with a human colleague than using a tool.
items: Manus AI flexibly adapts to constantly changing requirements
Manus AI remembers your preferences for future tasks
Manus AI becomes an increasingly understanding intelligent partner

guide.title: Visit the Official Website Now to Get an Invitation Code
guide.description: Manus AI is currently in closed beta. You can apply for an invitation code through the official website to be among the first to experience Manus AI's powerful features.
guide.discordButton: Go to Discord to Apply for an Invitation Code

closedBeta.title: Why is it Currently in Closed Beta?
closedBeta.description: Manus AI is in a rapid iteration phase. We hope to ensure a good experience for each user through an invitation system while collecting valuable feedback to continuously improve the product.

footer.description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) is an open standard for integrating AI models with external data and tools.
